comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: REPORT_CHEATER on December 13, 2023, 03:03:01 PMI've previously reported it in the thread Known Alts of any-one - A User Generated List Mk IV (2023 Q4) [MODERATED] üî¨ ¬†but it always gets deleted, I don't know. therefore I reported it in a new thread.please tag Bounty cheater.You didn't read the terms:QuoteNo "Newbie" or, "Junior Member" can post an investigation in this thread. They can however post a link (once) to a thread in the reputation section where their investigations can be investigated and analyzed.You can post this topic's link in the Timelord2067 thread, and this thread will then be your main source for your future findings.QuoteIf you investigate further, there are many transactions carried out by this fraudster - sending bounty results to one address: https://bscscan.com/address/0xf82efa50358fec00393f44d1398beb58de026fd9#tokentxnsChecking this address, gives pointers to other alts (possibly an old resurrected farm: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5024955.msg45561832#msg45561832). I'll give you some of what I found:MKP90 was bannedQuote from: MKP90 on June 30, 2022, 08:22:23 PMBSC Wallet Address: 0xd430Fa0F5fDB3431e6709777950BaC6E820651E9Quote from: mariawilson on September 20, 2023, 10:46:16 PMBSC Wallet Address: 0xd430Fa0F5fDB3431e6709777950BaC6E820651E9____________Quote from: metrocomputersau on December 05, 2023, 01:50:47 PMBSC wallet address: 0x4c189d00BeD6c861d5025e6d6B9C1Aef117Dd755Quote from: tilottama on December 08, 2023, 10:11:53 AMBinance Smart Chain Wallet Address: 0x4c189d00BeD6c861d5025e6d6B9C1Aef117Dd755Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: 0x521fAd3e4880e1AAD45Be08BFb2F32c25c40792CQuote from: edisonali on September 16, 2023, 09:50:02 AMBinance Smart Chain Wallet Address: 0x4c189d00BeD6c861d5025e6d6B9C1Aef117Dd755_____________EvelynAriana is the account of the old farm group who was caught.Quote from: EvelynAriana on December 13, 2023, 01:43:51 PMETH Wallet Address: 0x5722751dBB2c16069af9534b01266800317f4E4d_____________Quote from: AnindaPK on October 12, 2023, 11:57:57 AMBSC Wallet Address: 0xd0213859d7689426548D69D82024f551d1f193E0_____________Quote from: oindrilasarkar on September 25, 2023, 04:36:00 PMBSC wallet address: 0x977fd3291B347dAdeEbAA5515310F5e9E844D5C4

comments.author: ineedhelpplease
comments.body: Good catch on finding these bozos! Also question, how do you see who has been banned?

comments.author: www.Gambler.Casino
comments.body: Unfortunately, where there is free participation, there will always be multiple accounts

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Quote from: ineedhelpplease on December 13, 2023, 09:57:55 PMGood catch on finding these bozos! Also question, how do you see who has been banned?You can see that on the bpip.org website.Here is the profile of the user MKP90 mentioned by rat03gopoh:https://bpip.org/Profile?id=3344962

Also question, how do you see who has been banned?You can see that on the bpip.org website.Here is the profile of the user MKP90 mentioned by rat03gopoh:https://bpip.org/Profile?id=3344962 Thank you. Was trying to find that website and I did remember it before but it said "The service is unavailable."Edit: still says "The service is unavailable."

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Quote from: ineedhelpplease on December 14, 2023, 12:29:33 AMEdit: still says "The service is unavailable."At the moment it looks like there is still maintenance going on, you can try again later when the site is back to normal and can be accessed again.Quote from: REPORT_CHEATER on December 13, 2023, 03:03:01 PMI've previously reported it in the thread Known Alts of any-one - A User Generated List Mk IV (2023 Q4) [MODERATED] üî¨ ¬†but it always gets deleted, I don't know. therefore I reported it in a new thread.to the OP, the forum doesn't want to discriminate against newbies. but you can read the rules in the thread. This is to reduce problems that have occurred in the past.and also do as @rat03gopoh showed, it shows connections from the use of addresses or social media accounts. not just from blockchain transactions. because they can assume that these accounts are carrying out P2P trading.
